LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Letter_Title: You have Enlisted into Caesar's Legion.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Letter_Label:
Ave, recruit. This message comes from your Centurion. You have proven yourself worthy to march under the banner of the Bull. Caesar demands discipline, strength, and absolute loyalty. Do not fail him.

You will receive denarii as payment for your service, and provisions will be available at Legion camps when you report for duty. Our training grounds will hone your skills in combat and survival. Use them well.

-Ave, true to Caesar
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Button_Desc: Sign a new contract with Caesar's Legion.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlist_Requrements_Not_Satisf: You need to have minimum of 10 goodwill, currently you have only {0} goodwill.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Menu_Missions_Desc: As you enter the camp, you ask around about any assignments that need completing for the glory of Caesar.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Salary_Desc: You are entitled to collect wages from this faction every 14 days.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Provisions_Desc:
Provisions will arrive via your caravan inventory every 10 days:

- 12-18 Survival meal packs
- 20-30 Pemmican
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Provisions_Desc_Standard_Issu:
Legion standard issue gear will arrive via your caravan inventory every 45 days:

- ×2 Recruit Armor
- ×2 Recruit Helmet
- ×2 Gladius
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Storage_Desc: Store items from your caravan to your faction stash. Faction stashes transfer across all of the faction's camps and will save contents even if you are no longer enlisted.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Labor_Desc: Perform manual labor for the Legion and earn $8 an hour.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Medical_Camp_Desc: Report to the medical camp. This service tends to all of your team with herbal medicine. Immunity gain is also increased while your team is receiving treatment.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Combat_Training_Desc:
Train your legionaries in the art of war with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Melee
- Shooting

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Survival_Training_Desc:
Train your legionaries in survival skills with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Medicine
- Plants
- Animals

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Turn_In_Desc: Turn in prisoners and captives to Legion slave traders.\n\n -Turning over any hostile pawns do not result in a slavery debuff-
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Resign_Menu_Text: You will resign from Caesar's Legion effective immediately. (-30 in relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Resign_Button_Label: You have successfully resigned from Caesar's Legion. (-30 relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Enlisted_To_Hostile_Faction: cannot join because you are enlisted with their enemy, {HOSTILEFACTION_name}
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Kick_Out_Label_Title: An order for your contract's immediate termination has been filed by {LEADER_nameDef}. You have been kicked out from the {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Reinforcements_Button_Desc: Call for reinforcements from your faction. The number of legionaries they send depends on your current relations.
LanguageData.FCP_Legion_Turned_In_A_Slave: Turned in a slave to Legion
